How to Use GearForge

1

Browse Designs

Visit the Browse page to discover housing designs. Use filters to find specific categories like bedrooms, taverns, or gardens. Search for specific styles or themes.

2

Copy Import String

When you find a design you like, click the “Copy Import String” button. This copies the housing layout code to your clipboard.

3

Import in WoW

Open World of Warcraft and go to your housing interface. Look for the import option and paste the string. The design will be loaded into your home.

Note: You need to own the decor items used in the design.

4

Upload Your Own

Want to share your creations? Log in with your Battle.net account, then click Upload. Add screenshots, paste your import string, and choose a category.

Need More Help?

Check out our FAQ for answers to common questions.
